description: Update a project revenue item quantity estimate.
permissions: Allowed for users who can update the related project revenue item: admin users or manager members of the broker for the related project revenue item (delegated via ProjectRevenueItemQuantityEstimatePolicy -> ProjectRevenueItemPolicy).
side_effects: Updates a project revenue item quantity estimate.
validation_notes: <id> argument is required. At least one flag must be provided. If --estimate is provided, it must be valid JSON; it must be a JSON object or JSON null (use null to clear). --estimate cannot be an empty string. --project-estimate-set and --created-by cannot be empty when provided.

flags.name: --estimate
flags.description: Estimate JSON payload (use null to clear)
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON; must be a JSON object or JSON null. Cannot be empty string.
